title: Client Crashing Computer
body: My league client has been crashing my computer recently to where I have to hold the power button to restart. I've had 3 crashes in the past 5 games. Crashes have all happened near the start of the game after getting into the rift within 5 minutes or so. Luckily they were on normal blinds and a co-op vs ai game. I haven't had this problem ever before and the only recent change was the windows anniversary update (not sure if related). Would like to find the issue as soon as possible, since I can't play ranked if I have to worry about this being a  constant worry. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Same thing happens to me too, it isn't hardware whatsoever, since this new client has came out my laptop has crashed atlas 3 times before entering a game in simply the champion select screen!!!
This is happening to me also, once per week, in loading screen computer freezes and I need to restart it, randomly in rank or normals, I think the problem started somehow about beginigng af April...

It sounds like your hardware, outdated drivers, or game files are failing to render the game properly and causing you to crash.  I recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide, which will go over a range of steps to ensure your pc is tuned up and game files are running smoothly.  Let me know if you have any issue after!

Btw, AI vs Coop is still a matchmade game and leaving can cause other players a negative experience.  I recommend testing out in custom games to prevent any lower priority queue penalties!

I tried it in custom games and I'm still crashing the instant the game loads into the rift, after I've updated all my drivers, repaired the client, etc. Now I just rolled back the windows update to the previous version. Meanwhile I have to slog back through a bunch of co-op vs ai games now since I'm on 10 minute priority queue >:[
Has there been any problems since rolling back to the previous build?

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look!  I also recommend downloading our[ hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which can automatically gather a set of logs to give some more context.  Attach it to your ticket, and we'll respond as soon as possible!
